overview: Peter is an emotional story of a 10 years old boy Dhanya and a baby goat.The innocent friendship between these two is heart-touching.The village people were searching for goat for his sacrifice but due to village fair,all the goats had been scarified and only one goat was alive who was too small for the sacrifice
tagline: Peter is an emotional story of a 10 years old boy Dhanya and a baby goat.The innocent friendship between these two is heart-touching
title: Peter
